text: The Cyrillic letter Lje (Љ, љ) is a combination of Л and Ь and is used in Serbian and Macedonian. It makes the sound . It was created by Vuk Karadžić and is the same as the Latin digraph in the Serbian language and Croatian language. It is romanized using the letter L with caron (Ľ ľ). It also takes the form of Ль.
title: Lje
